summary: A film critic, journalist and curator working in the documentary field, with a special focus on films and media projects that concern human rights, social justice and activism.

Vitaly Manski, co-prod. Saxonia Entertainment
As a Line Producer, took care of all research and pre-production needs, incl. the development of the script, securing film permits, organising shootings and managing daily operations during production in Germany.

The First Sea - documentary, dir. Clara Trischler, prod. Kinomaton Berlin
Launched a campaign to raise funds for the film's post-production while working alongside the film's executive producer Sarita Sharma and director Clara Trischler. Reached out and maintained contact with organisations to raise awareness about the film within local communities.

Connected Walls - cross-media, prod. Grizzly Films
Supported the initial development of the project, conceived by Belgian filmmaker Sebastien Wielemans. Carried out research, drafted the project's proposal and further treatment, reached out to filmmakers in border areas (potential participants) and NGOs to gain valuable feedback on the needs of the project, which were later considered and implemented.", 'title': 'Researcher & Line Producer (selection)', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}]
